metadata.title: Our Story - How 3 Friends Built India's Most Loved Service Platform | KartSquare
metadata.description: From a midnight plumbing crisis to building KartSquare - discover the inspiring journey of 3 friends who solved India's biggest service booking problem. Join 50K+ happy customers today!

hero.title: The Story Behind Your Favorite Service App
hero.description: What started as a midnight crisis became India's most trusted service platform. This is the story of 3 friends who refused to accept that finding reliable help should be this hard.

originStory.title: It Started with a Crisis
originStory.crisisText: 2 AM, Bangalore. Yash's apartment was flooding. The pipe had burst, water everywhere, and he desperately needed a plumber. After 47 phone calls, 3 hours of waiting, and ‚Çπ2000 later, he realized something was fundamentally broken.
originStory.mainQuote: Why Is Finding Help So Damn Hard?
originStory.storyPart1: That night, Yash called his college buddies Ankit and Gaurang. They'd all faced the same frustration - unreliable contacts, hidden charges, no-shows, and zero accountability.
originStory.storyPart2: What if we could fix this for everyone? That question changed everything.
originStory.founderQuote: We weren't trying to build a unicorn. We just wanted to solve a problem that affected millions of Indians every single day.

journey.title: From Idea to Impact
journey.subtitle: Here's how three friends with zero funding built something that now serves thousands of families across India.

garageDays.title: The Garage Days
garageDays.description: 6 months of coding in Yash's garage. Living on Maggi and dreams. First prototype ready with 10 local service providers.

firstCustomers.title: First 100 Customers
firstCustomers.description: Word spread fast. Neighbors became customers, customers became advocates. We were solving a real problem.

growingImpact.title: Growing Impact
growingImpact.description: Today, we've helped 50,000+ customers find reliable services. From plumbers to party planners, we've got India covered.

mission.title: Our Mission & Values
mission.subtitle: Everything we do is guided by these core beliefs that keep us grounded and focused on what matters most.

customerFirst.title: Customer First
customerFirst.description: Every decision we make starts with 'How does this help our customers?'

trust.title: Trust & Transparency
trust.description: No hidden fees, no fake reviews, no empty promises. Just honest service.

speed.title: Speed & Simplicity
speed.description: Life's complicated enough. We make getting help as simple as ordering food.

empowering.title: Empowering Providers
empowering.description: We don't just serve customers - we help service providers build better businesses.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: From founders to engineers to marketing - the passionate team building India's most trusted service platform.

yash.name: Yash Soni
yash.story: The guy whose flooded apartment started it all. Now he's obsessed with making sure no one else has to go through 47 phone calls to find help.

gaurang.name: Gaurang Tyagi
gaurang.story: The tech wizard who built our rock-solid platform. When others see problems, Gaurang sees elegant solutions waiting to be coded.

rahul.name: Rahul Chanchlani
rahul.bio: Rahul is a frontend and mobile engineer who loves building intuitive, high-performance apps with a user-first approach.

bhinsar.name: Bhinsar Jagdish
bhinsar.bio: Bhinsar is a backend and DevOps specialist focused on scalable systems, automation, and reliable infrastructure.

pratham.name: Pratham Mittal
pratham.bio: Pratham drives growth and brand strategy, blending creativity with data-driven insights to scale impact and engagement.

groupSection.title: More Than a Platform. We're a Partnership.
groupSection.description1: Finding a reliable electrician or a skilled plumber in a bustling city like Jaipur has always been a challenge of trust and timing. At KartSquare, we're changing that narrative. We aren't just a booking app, we are the bridge connecting thousands of households with our community of vetted, skilled, and dedicated service professionals.
groupSection.description2: Our mission is twofold to bring you peace of mind with safe, high-quality home services, and to empower local technicians with the tools and opportunities to grow their businesses and secure their livelihoods.

impact.title: The Impact We're Making
impact.subtitle: Numbers tell a story, but behind each number is a real person whose life we've made a little bit easier.

cta.title: Want to Be Part of Our Story?
cta.description: Whether you're a customer looking for reliable services or a professional wanting to grow your business, there's a place for you in the KartSquare family.

metadata.title: All Services - Home, Beauty, Join Waitlist & More | KartSquare Service Marketplace
metadata.description: Browse 50+ verified services on KartSquare. From home cleaning to event planning, beauty treatments to repairs - find trusted professionals with transparent pricing.

hero.title: Connect with Verified Local Service Providers
hero.description: Kartsquare makes it easy to find trusted professionals for all your service needs. Every provider is ID-verified and admin-approved for your safety and peace of mind.

offer.subtitle: What We Offer
offer.title: What Kind of Services We Offer
offer.description1: Kartsquare connects you with verified local service providers across multiple categories. From home maintenance to personal care, beauty services to event planning, find the right professional for every need.
offer.description2: Our platform offers a comprehensive range of services, all backed by our rigorous verification process. Every provider is ID-verified, and every service is admin-approved to ensure quality and reliability.
offer.imageDescription: Connect with verified professionals for all your service needs

categories.subtitle: Service Categories
categories.title: Categories of Services
categories.description: Explore our comprehensive range of verified service categories. Each category features professional, ID-verified providers ready to serve you.

homeCleaning.title: Home Cleaning
homeCleaning.description: Professional house cleaning services including deep cleaning, regular maintenance, and specialized cleaning for your home.

plumbing.title: Plumbing Services
plumbing.description: Expert plumbing repairs, installations, and maintenance by verified professionals available 24/7.

beauty.title: Beauty & Salon
beauty.description: Salon and spa services at your doorstep including haircuts, facials, massages, and beauty treatments.

homeServices.title: Home Services
homeServices.description: Comprehensive home maintenance including electrical work, carpentry, painting, and appliance repairs.

carWash.title: Car Wash
carWash.description: Professional car cleaning services including exterior wash, interior detailing, and premium car care.

fitness.title: Fitness & Wellness
fitness.description: Personal trainers, yoga instructors, and wellness coaches available at your home or preferred location.

catering.title: Catering Services
catering.description: Professional catering for events, parties, and gatherings with customizable menus and expert chefs.

eventPlanning.title: Event Planning
eventPlanning.description: Complete event planning services for weddings, birthdays, corporate events, and special occasions.

booking.subtitle: Booking Process
booking.title: How Do I Book a Service?
booking.description: Booking a service on Kartsquare is simple, fast, and secure. Follow these easy steps to get started.

step1.title: Browse & Select Service
step1.description: Explore our wide range of verified services. Filter by category, location, and ratings to find the perfect service provider for your needs.
step1.details: Search through thousands of verified service providers, read reviews, and compare prices before making your selection.

step2.title: Book Your Appointment
step2.description: Choose your preferred date and time. Our flexible scheduling system allows you to book services that fit your schedule perfectly.
step2.details: Select from available time slots, add special instructions, and confirm your booking with just a few clicks.

step3.title: Service Provider Arrives
step3.description: Your verified service provider will arrive at the scheduled time. All providers are ID-verified and background-checked for your safety.
step3.details: Track your service provider's arrival in real-time, communicate directly through the app, and ensure everything meets your expectations.

step4.title: Pay Securely After Service
step4.description: Review the completed work and pay securely through our platform. Payment is only processed after you confirm satisfaction with the service.
step4.details: Multiple payment options available including UPI, cards, and digital wallets. All transactions are secure and protected.

provider.subtitle: Join as Provider
provider.title: How Do I Join Kartsquare?
provider.description: Ready to grow your service business? Join our network of verified providers and start receiving bookings today. Our simple onboarding process gets you started in no time.

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.description: Sign up as a service provider with your basic information. The registration process is quick and straightforward.
step1.details: Provide your contact details, service area, and basic business information to get started.

step2.title: Complete ID Verification
step2.description: Upload your government-issued ID and business documents. Our verification process ensures trust and safety for all users.
step2.details: Submit Aadhaar, PAN, or other valid ID proof along with any relevant business licenses or certifications.

step3.title: Admin Review & Approval
step3.description: Our team reviews your documents and profile. Once approved, you'll receive access to the provider dashboard.
step3.details: Verification typically takes 24-48 hours. You'll be notified via email and SMS once your account is approved.

step4.title: Add Your Services
step4.description: Create detailed service listings with pricing, availability, and service descriptions. Add photos to showcase your work.
step4.details: Set your service rates, define service areas, upload portfolio images, and specify your availability schedule.

step5.title: Start Receiving Bookings
step5.description: Once your services are live, customers can book your services. Manage all bookings through your provider dashboard.
step5.details: Receive instant notifications for new bookings, manage your schedule, and build your reputation with customer reviews.

safety.subtitle: Safety & Trust
safety.title: Trust & Safety
safety.description: Your safety and security are our top priorities. We've built multiple layers of protection and verification to ensure a safe, reliable experience for everyone on our platform.

verified.title: ID-Verified Providers
verified.description: Every service provider on Kartsquare undergoes mandatory ID verification. We verify government-issued identification documents to ensure authenticity and build trust.

approved.title: Admin-Approved Services
approved.description: All service listings are manually reviewed and approved by our admin team before going live. We ensure quality, legitimacy, and accurate pricing for every service.

support.title: 24/7 Customer Support
support.description: Our dedicated customer support team is available round the clock to assist with bookings, resolve issues, and answer any questions you may have.

payments.title: Secure Payments
payments.description: All payments are processed through secure, encrypted channels. Your financial information is protected, and payments are only processed after service completion.

rating.title: Rating & Review System
rating.description: Transparent rating and review system helps you make informed decisions. Read authentic customer feedback before booking any service.

dispute.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute.description: Our mediation team helps resolve any issues between customers and providers fairly and efficiently, ensuring satisfaction for all parties.

acceptance.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.paragraph1: By accessing, browsing, or using KartSquare‚Äôs services ‚Äî including booking home services, event management, and professional consultations ‚Äî you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions.
acceptance.paragraph2: If you do not agree with these terms, please discontinue the use of our platform immediately.

serviceDescription.heading: 2. Our Services
serviceDescription.paragraph1: KartSquare provides an online marketplace that connects users ('Users') with independent third-party service providers ('Service Providers'). Our platform facilitates the booking, payment, and communication for services but does not provide the services directly. KartSquare's role is strictly that of a technology intermediary.
serviceDescription.paragraph2: Services may include, but are not limited to, home cleaning, plumbing, catering, photography, event planning, and personalized consultations.

userResponsibilities.heading: 3. User Accounts and Conduct
userResponsibilities.item1: Provide accurate, up-to-date, and complete information during registration and booking, and maintain the security of your account password.
userResponsibilities.item2: Ensure service areas are safe and accessible for providers and provide a cooperative environment.
userResponsibilities.item3: Refrain from using the platform for any unlawful, fraudulent, or harmful purpose, or to transmit any abusive or objectionable content.
userResponsibilities.item4: Pay all applicable fees, taxes, and charges for services booked through your account in a timely manner.
userResponsibilities.item5: Treat Service Providers with respect and professionalism. Any form of harassment or discrimination will result in immediate account termination.

providerObligations.heading: 4. Service Provider Obligations
providerObligations.item1: Deliver services to a professional standard, as advertised and agreed upon at the time of booking.
providerObligations.item2: Maintain professional, courteous, and respectful behavior when interacting with Users.
providerObligations.item3: Comply with all applicable laws, safety regulations, and hygiene standards relevant to their services.
providerObligations.item4: Respect User privacy and property, and not disclose any personal information obtained during a service.

bookingPolicy.heading: 5. Event Booking Policy
bookingPolicy.paragraph1: When booking large-scale services or events (e.g., parties, weddings, corporate gatherings), specific terms from the Service Provider may apply in addition to these general terms.
bookingPolicy.item1: Non-refundable deposits may be required to secure event dates and services.
bookingPolicy.item2: Final payment must be completed by the date specified by the Service Provider, typically before the event.
bookingPolicy.item3: Cancellations made within a specified timeframe (e.g., 7-14 days) of the scheduled date may result in partial or full forfeiture of the deposit and other payments.
bookingPolicy.item4: KartSquare is not liable for event cancellations or failures caused by circumstances beyond our reasonable control (force majeure), including natural disasters, government actions, or third-party failures.

paymentPolicy.heading: 6. Payment and Refund Policy
paymentPolicy.paragraph1: Payments for services are processed securely through our third-party payment gateway partners. By booking, you authorize KartSquare to charge your selected payment method for the total amount, including service fees, taxes, and any tips.
paymentPolicy.paragraph2: Refund eligibility is determined by the Service Provider‚Äôs cancellation policy and the timing of the cancellation. Refund requests must be submitted through the KartSquare support center within 24 hours of a completed or cancelled service.
paymentPolicy.paragraph3: KartSquare reserves the right to issue refunds or credits at our sole discretion. Disputes between Users and Service Providers should be reported to us for mediation, but we are not obligated to provide a refund.

intellectualProperty.heading: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.paragraph1: All content on the KartSquare platform, including logos, text, graphics, software, and trademarks, is the exclusive property of KartSquare or its licensors and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content from the platform without our prior written permission.

privacy.heading: 8. Privacy
privacy.paragraph1: Your privacy is paramount. Our collection and use of your personal information are governed by our <link>Privacy Policy</link>, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference.
privacy.paragraph2: We implement robust security measures to protect your data, but we cannot guarantee absolute security against unauthorized breaches.

liability.heading: 9. Limitation of Liability
liability.paragraph1: KartSquare serves as a facilitator and is not liable for the actions, negligence, or conduct of Users or Service Providers. We do not assume responsibility for any damages, losses, injuries, or disputes arising from services booked through our platform.
liability.paragraph2: To the fullest extent permitted by law, KartSquare, its directors, employees, and affiliates shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from your use of the platform.

termination.heading: 10. Termination
termination.paragraph1: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account and access to the platform at our discretion, without notice, for any conduct that we believe violates these Terms, is harmful to other users, or is otherwise fraudulent or illegal.

governingLaw.heading: 11. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
governingLaw.paragraph1: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Bangalore, Karnataka.

changes.heading: 12. Changes to Terms
changes.paragraph1: KartSquare reserves the right to modify or update these Terms and Conditions at any time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or in-app notifications. Your continued use of the platform after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

contact.heading: 13. Contact Information
contact.paragraph1: For any questions or support regarding these Terms, please contact us at <email>support@kartsquare.com</email> or visit our <contactLink>Contact Page</contactLink>.

aboutKartSquare.title: Everyday services, just a square away.
aboutKartSquare.description: From beauty & wellness to home care and events ‚Äî KartSquare makes it easy to book trusted professionals anytime, anywhere.

faq.title: Everything about KartSquare
faq.description: We believe booking services should be simple, safe, and valuable. Here are some frequently asked questions to help you trust and use KartSquare with ease.

easyToUse.question: Is KartSquare easy to use?
easyToUse.answer: Yes! KartSquare is designed with a simple and intuitive interface. Search, compare, and book services in just a few taps ‚Äî no confusion, just convenience.

safeSecure.question: Is KartSquare safe and secure?
safeSecure.answer: Absolutely. We use secure payment gateways, verified service providers, and trusted reviews so you can book with confidence and peace of mind.

provideValue.question: How does KartSquare provide value?
provideValue.answer: KartSquare saves you time and effort by connecting you to trending services instantly. From real-time availability to exclusive offers, we make sure you always get the best deal and experience.

howItWorks.title: 3 Simple Steps to Get Any Service Done
howItWorks.mapDescription: No more calling multiple people, comparing prices, or worrying about quality. Just tell us what you need!
howItWorks.description: Whether you need a plumber at midnight or a chef for tomorrow's party, KartSquare makes it happen. Our smart matching connects you with the perfect professional in your area, handles payments securely, and ensures quality every time.

getInTouch.title: Ready to Make Your Life 10x Easier?

industriesOrbit.title: Serving 2500+ Companies Across India

kartSquareSolutions.description: KartSquare eliminates the frustration of searching endlessly, calling multiple providers, and worrying about trust or payments. Whether it's beauty, wellness, home services, or events ‚Äî KartSquare brings everything under one secure and smart platform.

properties.description: Skip the hassle of finding reliable people. These are the services our customers love most ‚Äî vetted professionals, transparent pricing, and guaranteed satisfaction.

Whether it's fixing a leaky tap, getting a quick AC repair, booking a salon at home, or planning your next big celebration‚ÄîKartSquare connects you with **trusted, verified professionals in seconds**.
aboutKartSquareQuestions.description2: No more long searches, confusing prices, or unreliable providers. With KartSquare, you get **speed, transparency, and peace of mind**‚Äîall in one square ‚ú®.
